SearchWipActHistory.MainSQL: SELECT DURABLE_ID , LOT_ID , TRANSACTION_CODE , TRANSACTION_DATE , PROCESS_CODE , ROUTE_ID , FACTORY_AREA_ID , EQUIPMENT_ID , LOT_DETL_TYPE_CODE , LOT_TRANSACTION_COMMENT , TRANSACTION_USER_ID , PRODUCTION_TYPE_CODE , SPCL_RSNCODE FROM TB_EGN_LOT_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 100 AND TRANSACTION_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(@StartTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(@EndTime, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') +Option1 +Option2 order by TRANSACTION_DATE desc
